title: W40 7th edition Rulebook and Updated Codexs
description:
After looking around on I saw that no one had put together the most up to date rules and codexs for the W40k 7th Edition. Included is the Codexs for:

Adepta Sororitas
Chao Daemons
Chao Space Marines
Necrons
Tyrainds
Legion of the Damned
Dark Angels
Eldar
Imperial Knights
Inquisition
Space Marines
Tau Empire
Astra Militarum (Imperial Guard 6th Edition)
Dark Eldar
Orks
Space Wolves

I also threw in the following rule books:

W40k Apocalypse + W40k Apocalypse Reloaded
Planetary Empires


I'll see about doing an update for 2015 if they have a bunch of new codexs.

Disclaimer, some of the pdf s are converted e-books which may have weird formatting and appearance BUT they work for in terms of the world.
